nom.tam.fits

Class FitsHeap

  • java.lang.Object
    • nom.tam.fits.FitsHeap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FitsElement

    public class FitsHeap
extends Object
implements FitsElement
    This class supports the FITS heap. This is currently used for variable length columns in binary tables.

      • rewrite

        public void rewrite()
             throws IOException,
                    FitsException
        Description copied from interface: FitsElement
        Rewrite the contents of the element in place. The data must have been orignally read from a random access device, and the size of the element may not have changed.
        Specified by:
        rewrite in interface FitsElement
        Throws:
        IOException - if the rewrite was unsuccessful.
        FitsException - if the rewrite was unsuccessful.
